LanguageData.Kurin_Shell_Cardigan.description: A fluffy and warm cardigan. Be careful not to stretch your clothes!
LanguageData.Kurin_Shell_Duster.description: It is a stylish coat that can ward off significant heat and some cold.
LanguageData.Kurin_Shell_Winter_Padding.description: Thick winter padding. A winter necessity for Kurins.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Traditional_Coat.descriptio: Kurin's traditional outerwear that features a white pattern on a simple navy blue coat.
